name: Rhythm Henry
description:
Uh oh... Henry is rambling again... rhythmically? It's the hit new rhythm game, Rhythm Henry!

How to Play:

When you hear a pattern of 3 noises of ascending pitches - press the Space Bar on the next beat! Sometimes the prompt comes at a faster speed - be prepared!

Henry loves you! Show your love by getting a Superb!

Developed by Good With Pancakes Games:

Ewan "Jams" Fisher - Programmer/Designer

Henry "Sugarcube" Neff - Artist/Sound Designer
